name: css-vars-docs
description: Generates a comment block with all CSS variables from the specified file to improve readability and provide documentation. The block is added at the beginning of the file, or in the first <style> block for non-CSS files, if available.

scripts.build: npm run build:clear && npm run build:copy && npm run build:uglify
scripts.build:copy: mkdir -p dist && copyfiles lib/* package.json README.md LICENSE dist/
scripts.build:uglify: uglifyjs dist/lib/css-vars-docs.cjs -o dist/lib/css-vars-docs.cjs --mangle --compress && uglifyjs dist/lib/cli.cjs -o dist/lib/cli.cjs --mangle --compress && uglifyjs dist/lib/postcss.cjs -o dist/lib/postcss.cjs --mangle --compress

author: Timo Schlotmann
